code: import React,{Component}from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import{showNotification}from'utils/notifications';import Group from'../partials/group';import Button from'../partials/button';import Description from'../partials/description';import Form from'./form';export default class Referral extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={code:'NONE',income:0,bonus:0,referrals:{total:0,confirmed:0},confirmLevel:0};}componentDidMount(){rpc.callServer('Referral-GetInfo').then(data=>this.setState(()=>data));}async useCode(code){try{await rpc.callServer('Referral-UseCode',code);showNotification('success','Промокод успiшно активовано');}catch(err){if(err.msg)showNotification('error',err.msg);}}render(){const{code,bonus,income,referrals,confirmLevel}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"referral"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Group,{className:"referral_info"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{current:code},"\u041A\u043E\u0434"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{current:referrals.total.toString()},"\u0412\u0432\u0435\u043B\u0438"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{current:referrals.confirmed.toString()},"\u041E\u0442\u0440\u0438\u043C\u0430\u043B\u0438 \u0431\u043E\u043D\u0443\u0441")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Description,null,"\u041Fi\u0441\u043B\u044F \u0434\u043E\u0441\u044F\u0433\u043D\u0435\u043D\u043D\u044F ".concat(confirmLevel,"\u0433\u043E \u0440i\u0432\u043D\u044F \u0433\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0446\u044F, \u0432i\u043D \u043E\u0442\u0440\u0438\u043C\u0430\u0454 ").concat(bonus,"$, \u0430 \u0432\u0438 ").concat(income,"$.")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Form,{submit:this.useCode.bind(this)}));}}
